sentence.Network_en: Is that pesky lady coming to the office again?
sentence.Network_cn: 那个讨厌的女人又来办公室 啦 ?

sentence.Network_en: Those pesky salesmen always call at dinner time.
sentence.Network_cn: 那些讨厌的推销员总是在吃晚饭的时候打电话.

sentence.Network_en: Those pesky people are really annoying.
sentence.Network_cn: 那群讨厌鬼真叫人讨厌.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: perhaps related to pest

example.ex: ...as if he were a pesky tourist asking silly questions of a busy man.
example.tran: 好像他是个让人讨厌的旅客，尽向忙碌的人问些愚蠢的问题

sentences.sentence: "tapping an annoying rhythm on his glass with his fork"
"aircraft noise is particularly bothersome near the airport"
"found it galling to have to ask permission"
"a teasing and persistent thought annoyed him"
"it is vexing to have to admit you are wrong"

auth_sentence.content: You keep on ignoring those pesky things called facts.
